Name: Wheelie King VR
About the game: Realistic motorbike simulator. Real wrist throttle and clutch! Drive 49cc scooters to 1300cc big bikes! Tune and upgrade bikes. Add turbos and NOS to bikes. Every part changes bike driving attribute. 4 camera angles. Free ride open world. Timeattack. Challenge mode. Escape from cops and collect checkpoints on free ride. Control wheelies using your wrist! Pop up wheelies using clutch or motor power! Brake+throttle to activate drifting mode!
